USA HobbiesReading, Listening and Writing Music, Art, Philanthropy Favorite SportsBasketball Favorite ColorBlue Favorite MusicHip-hop Favorite MovieGodfather 2 Favorite Song"Respect" by Aretha Franklin, "I can't get no satisfaction" by The Rolling Stones, "Imagine" by John Lennon, "Like a Rolling Stone" by The Rolling Stones Favorite Books The Seat of the Soul by Gary Zukav, The Celestine Prophecy by James Redfield, and The Odyssey by Homer Favorite RappersKool G Rap, Eminem Favorite FoodPasta, Cereal Favorite DrinkAemand de Brignac Champagne Favorite PerfumeGold Jay Z Favorite PetDogs Favorite CigarMontecristos, Cohiba Comador Cigar Favorite AlbumReasonable Doubt Major Controversies• Jay Z and Beyonce were sued for using a Hungarian artist's voice in their song "Drunk in love".

• His business Tidal has been sued by "The American Dollar" artists Richard Cupolo and John Emanuele for not paying full royalties to them.

• He was sued for using Hamdi’s 1957 hit ‘Khosara Khosara’ song in creating ‘Big Pimpin.' Girls, Affairs and More Marital StatusMarried Affairs/GirlfriendsBlu Cantrell

Some Lesser Known Facts About Jay Z

Does Jay Z smoke ?: Yes

Does Jay Z drink alcohol?: Yes

Jay Z has received 21 Grammy Awards for his music as well as for other categories.

He is an affluent entrepreneur and owns the New York sports bar 40/40 Club and is the co-creator for the clothing line Rocawear (Annual revenue – $700 million). He also is the founder of Roc Nation and co-founder of Roc-A-Fella records. Runs a website by the name of Life+Times.

Jay Z was raised by a single mother; he met his father after 33 years and forgave him.

He shot his elder brother in the shoulder for stealing Jay Z’s jewelry.

Jay Z and Busta Rhymes went to the same school and also did a rap battle in the cafeteria.

He is close friends with Barrack Obama but he never wants to be a politician.

He pledged $1 million to the American Red Cross after the hurricane Katrina.

In 2009, Jay Z and his wife Beyonce were named the most powerful couple in the world, with a combined income of $162 million.

Jay Z does not write his lyrics down anywhere, he creates them just in his head.

His name Jay Z is inspired by his old nickname Jazzy.

His song ‘Show Me What You Got’ was leaked online and the FBI was probed to take care of the matter.

Jay Z sold CDs out of his car before he founded his own record label with Damon Dash and Kareem Biggs.

Jay Z used to sell crack to earn money and used a rubber band as the money clip.

His nephew Colleek D. Luckie died in 2005, driving the Chrystler 300 that Jay Z had gifted him as a graduation gift.

Takes Beyonce on a Pizza date every Sunday.

Of the few people that talked to Biggie on the phone before he died, Jay Z was one of them.

His testing level was that of a twelfth grade when he was just in sixth grade; close to a child prodigy.

His father died the night he had the opening ceremony of his club.

Jay Z has more number one albums than Elvis.

Jay Z is a co-owner in the basketball team Brooklyn Nets.

Beyonce and Jay Z are supposed to be coming up with a collaborative album and it is said that it is completed already but there is no news about its release.
